articles.title: 6 News at 5:30 p.m. for 2/14/2025
articles.summary: Dyson's Gen5outsize Absolute vacuum cleaner features strong suction power, a sleek design, and cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: New Sioux Falls flower shop opens in time for Valentine's Day
articles.summary: A new flower shop opened in Sioux Falls in time for Valentine's Day. This represents the launch of a new retail service offering.

articles.title: New Day Car Wash celebrates grand opening, Feb. 20-23—special deals + free car washes
articles.author: Grace Garrison
articles.summary: New Day Car Wash is launching its grand opening in Trussville with a 'Free Wash Weekend,' from February 20-23, offering a Signature Wash (a $30 value) for free, along with a $1 membership deal for the first month. The car wash offers multiple services, including Basic, Classic, Deluxe, and Signature washes, with the Signature wash including graphene protection, extra foam, rinse, and a wheel booster.

articles.title: Syntheia Announces First 1,000 Subscriptions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. launched its AssistantNLP platform, a conversational AI solution, and successfully acquired its first 1,000 subscribers. The company achieved this milestone ahead of management's expectations, reaching 10% of its 2025 forecast within the first two weeks of February 2025.

articles.title: Syntheia Announces First 1,000 Subscriptions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. launched its 'Never on Hold Again Club' referral program, which rewards customers for referring businesses to Syntheia. Additionally, Syntheia's AssistantNLP service is available in three pricing tiers: Freemium, Basic, and Pro, each offering different features and minutes per month.

articles.title: Syntheia Announces First 1,000 Subscriptions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has announced its AssistantNLP platform has reached its first 1,000 subscribers ahead of Management's expectations. The company achieved 10% of its 2025 subscriber forecast within the first two weeks of February 2025.

articles.title: Australian Homes Get a Summer Floor Cleaning Revamp with Roborock's New F25 Series Wet-Dry Vacuum
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the F25 series, a new wet and dry cleaning device, with two models: F25 and F25 ACE. The F25 will be available in Australia from February 15th, 2025, for $699, while the F25 ACE will be available in March for $999 through Roborock's official online store and authorized retailers. This series features advanced cleaning capabilities like strong suction power and tangle-free roller technology.

articles.title: Score $1,100 off this mattress for Presidents Day and sleep like a king
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Slumber Solutions is promoting their 14-inch Gel Memory Foam Choose Your Comfort Mattress, featuring a multi-layered construction with gel-infused memory foam for temperature regulation and support foam for balanced comfort.  The mattress is currently offered at a discounted price of $461.35 in honor of Presidents Day from original price of $1,561.99.

articles.title: ad encourages you
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new Game Pass ad within the Windows 11 Settings menu, promoting a free PC Game Pass trial that users can share with friends. This ad will appear for eligible users signed into their Microsoft accounts and is currently being rolled out to the Dev and Beta Channels in Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26120.3281.

articles.title: Posted Feb 14, 2025 at 4:13 PM EST 0 Comments / 0 New E Emma Roth Windows 11 is testing another Game Pass ad for your Settings menu. The ad encourages you to 'recruit your squad' with a free trial of PC Game Pass that you can share with friends. Microsoft says the ad will only appear if you're signed into your Microsoft account and 'meet the required eligibility criteria,' similar to the other Game Pass ad it tested last year. It's rolling out now to the Dev and Beta Channels in Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26120.3281.
articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a Game Pass advertisement within the Windows 11 settings menu. This ad promotes a free trial of PC Game Pass to users who meet eligibility criteria. The feature is being rolled out to the Dev and Beta Channels in Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26120.3281.

articles.title: Inspired Home Show 2025 New Product Showcase to Feature MixAid, InventHelp Client Invention
articles.author: Maria Jones
articles.summary: InventHelp client invention, MixAid, will be featured in the 2025 Inspired Home Show's New Product Showcase. MixAid provides an improved method for keeping stand mixer bowls clean during the baking process, is reusable, and is listed on Amazon under MODAURA. It is designed to save users valuable time and effort during baking preparation and is under consideration for the GIA Product Design Award.

articles.title: Australian Homes Get a Summer Floor Cleaning Revamp with Roborock's New F25 Series Wet-Dry Vacuum
articles.summary: Roborock is launching its F25 Series wet-dry vacuum cleaner range in Australia, including the F25 and F25 ACE models. The F25 series boasts features like smart wet and dry cleaning, JawScrapers zero-tangle technology, and self-cleaning/drying rollers. The Roborock F25 will be available from February 15, 2025, at $699, while the F25 ACE will be available in March at $999.

articles.title: NASCAR Even Has A Sponsor For The Track Dryer At The Daytona 500
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Suburban Propane will unveil a Propane-powered Jet Dryer for the 67th Daytona 500 on February 16. The Jet Dryer is a new product being introduced by Suburban Propane in the context of NASCAR sponsorship.

articles.title: ‘SNL's' Anniversary Gift to NBC: Classic Sketches Turned Into Commercials, Including The Californians and Please Don't Destroy
articles.author: Brian Steinberg
articles.summary: Volkswagen, Allstate, Capital One, and Maybelline sponsored the 'Saturday Night Live' 50th anniversary special. Volkswagen provided transportation, Allstate sponsored an on-screen countdown, Capital One backed a 'fan pit,' and Maybelline hosted a 'Last Look Lounge.' These sponsorships represent a new approach to integrating brands with the iconic show, with NBC offering unique advertising opportunities.

articles.title: New Balance's $140 Fresh Foam Sneakers That Shoppers Say Feel Like 'Walking on a Cloud' Are on Sale for Just $70
articles.author: Jeff Turbett
articles.summary: New Balance Fresh Foam X 840V1 Sneakers are available at Nordstrom Rack with a 50% discount. The sneakers feature Fresh Foam X midsole for comfort, a snug fit, and a molded heel for support. They are designed for everyday wear, including walking and running, and have received the Seal of Acceptance from the American Podiatric Medical Association (APMA).

articles.title: Drew Barrymore's go-to Adidas sneakers are down to $39 for Presidents' Day
articles.summary: Adidas Nizza Platform Shoes are gaining popularity due to their comfort and versatility. The sneakers feature an EVA sock liner for all-day comfort and are praised for their style, fitting various outfits. They are currently on sale and have received positive reviews for being wide-foot friendly and suitable for long hours of walking.

articles.title: EssayService Writing Service
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: EssayService provides a platform offering academic writing assistance, including essays, research papers, coursework, and editing services. The platform enables students to select from experienced writers and offers free revisions. EssayService prioritizes quality and user experience by offering a simple ordering system and dependable deadline management.

articles.title: Meta is reportedly working on humanoid robots that help with chores
articles.author: Will Shanklin
articles.summary: Meta is planning to build a platform for humanoid robots focusing on household chores like folding laundry and dishwashing. They aim to create underlying sensors, AI, and software for other companies to use in their hardware, similar to Google's Android platform. Meta has reportedly discussed its plans with Unitree and Figure AI.

articles.title: Henkel Product Winners: Product of the Year(TM) 2025
articles.author: Henkel
articles.summary: Dial's Healthy Hydration Body Wash, containing Shea Butter Extract, Coconut Milk, and Hyaluronic Acid, has won the Product of the Year award in the Body Wash Category. Persil's Activewear Clean, designed for athletic wear, won in the Laundry Category. Schwarzkopf's Keratin Root Permanent Color and Keratin Root Temporary Color & Thickening Spray won in the Beauty Category.

articles.title: Nexus 7 Pixel edition: it's time for Google to resurrect the greatest tablet ever
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Google may release a 'Pixel Tablet Mini' with a charging speaker dock, reviving the spirit of the iconic Nexus 7. This new mini tablet would compete with Apple's iPad mini. The potential launch is based on the demand for miniature tablets and a combination of nostalgia and updated Android software.

articles.title: Cosmo HQ Review: Are Dior's New Solid Perfumes Worth the Hype... And the Price Tag?
articles.author: Jasmine Hyman
articles.summary: Dior has launched new solid perfume versions of its Miss Dior fragrance, available in Parfum, Eau de Parfum, and Blooming Bouquet scents. Packaged in lipstick-like cases, these solid perfumes are spill-proof, easy to apply, and provide a subtle, long-lasting scent. The product ranges from $72 to $94.

articles.title: Everybody's Favorite Sheets At Target Are Their Lowest Price Ever – But The Sale Ends Soon
articles.author: Emily Ruane
articles.summary: Target is offering a 40% discount on its 400 thread-count cotton performance sheets, reducing the price of a full-size set to $24. The sheets are available in multiple prints and solid colors, promising wrinkle, pilling, and shrinkage resistance. This deal is for a limited time.

articles.title: Marks and Spencers shoppers rave about cosy jumper that's 20 percent off
articles.author: Aine Kenny
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer is offering its Cloud-Yarn Textured Crew Neck Jumper with a 20% discount, bringing the price down to €28.80. The jumper is available in seven colors and is crafted from cloud yarn, designed for a soft and comfortable feel. Customer reviews indicate satisfaction with the jumper's softness and fit, though some have noted pilling after a few wears.

articles.title: The Welcome's South Korean Gwangju Companies Showcase Cutting-Edge Innovations at CES 2025 in Las Vegas
articles.summary: Four South Korean companies, BLUECAPSULE, TWIGFARM, ALL THE TIME, and AUNIONAI, are showcasing new AI-powered products at CES 2025. BLUECAPSULE is introducing Artificial Intelligence Virtual Solutions (AIVS) Technology, TWIGFARM is launching LETR WORKS for content optimization and translation, ALL THE TIME is debuting an AI safety device, and AUNIONAI is presenting AunionAI-DUB for automatic dubbing and translation.

articles.title: The Welcome's South Korean Gwangju Companies Showcase Cutting-Edge Innovations at CES 2025 in Las Vegas
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Several South Korean companies unveiled new AI-powered products and services at CES 2025. BLUECAPSULE introduced AIVS for smart content creation. TWIGFARM launched LETR WORKS, an AI-powered language translation tool, while ALL THE TIME presented an AI safety device, and AUNIONAI showcased its AI-driven dubbing and translation service.

articles.title: One of the best vacuums we've ever tested — the Dyson V12 — is $150 off for Presidents' Day
articles.summary: Dyson is offering the V12 Detect Slim Cordless Vacuum at a discounted price of $500, a $150 reduction from its usual price. The V12 Detect Slim, weighing just over 5 lbs, features a 60-minute run time and includes a FluffyOptic hard floor brush. This model boasts powerful suction and an LCD display, receiving positive feedback from customers who praise its lightweight design and effective cleaning capabilities on various surfaces.

articles.title: Andru Marino
articles.author: Andru Marino
articles.summary: Syntilay is launching AI-designed, 3D-printed footwear priced at $150. The company aims to manufacture custom shoes in two months, positioning itself as a provider for content creators.

articles.title: When AI makes shoes.
articles.author: Andru Marino
articles.summary: Syntilay has introduced AI-designed, 3D-printed footwear that uses phone scans for custom sizing. The company aims to create custom shoes for YouTuber merchandise, utilizing software like Midjourney for design.

articles.title: How to create an online store with Wix
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Wix offers a drag-and-drop builder that allows users to create professional online stores without needing coding skills. This service enables easy online store creation for Wix users.

articles.title: London mobile phone business opens second store in Norfolk
articles.author: Gabriella Crisp
articles.summary: Mobilink has expanded from Croydon, London, by launching a second store in Wymondham. The new location provides mobile phone and laptop repairs, pre-loved phones, accessories, and vapes to the local community, offering services that were previously only accessible in the city.

articles.title: Fans of the 'minimal makeup' look praise Kylie Jenner's blurring foundation cut by 20%
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Kylie Cosmetics has launched the Skin Tint Blurring Elixir Foundation, a weightless skin tint designed for a natural, dewy finish. The foundation, containing hyaluronic acid, promises 12-hour wear and blurring properties, available at Boots and LookFantastic. The product has received generally positive reviews for its lightweight coverage and blurring effect.

articles.title: 'Absolutely fantastic' steam mop cleans and dries floors in minutes
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: The Livington Steam Mop, a multifunctional cleaning device is available for purchase at Yimbly and Amazon. Argos is offering a Vax Steam Mop for £50 and Shark's Klik n' Flip Automatic Steam Mop is on sale for £99. These devices aim to deep clean floors without chemicals, using steam to remove dirt, grime, germs, and bacteria.

articles.title: Amazon's £40 'game-changer' spin mop gives you 'sparkling floors'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Aqua Revolution System X'tra Floor Mop which separates clean and dirty water and has a microfibre cloth that removes 99% of bacteria with just water. Its key features include a spinning mechanism, a foldable flat mop head for corners, and an extendable handle. Debenhams also offers a mop with rotating dry heads for efficient cleaning.

articles.title: New J20 flavour sends shoppers into frenzy after sighting in Home Bargains
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
org: Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK Group
articles.summary: J20 has launched a new Dragonberry flavour, a fruit juice featuring blackberry and dragon fruit flavours, available at Home Bargains. Monster has introduced its new Rio Punch flavour energy drink, exclusively available at Home Bargains. Reese's white chocolate peanut butter bar and Terry's Chocolate Orange Egg are also new treats available for purchase.

articles.title: Samsung's outdated smartphones won't get new One UI 7 features
articles.author: Natasha Kumar
articles.summary: Samsung's One UI 7 on Android 15 will introduce new features, but some, such as NOW BRIEF which analyzes the schedule and offers up-to-date information based on the time of day, will be exclusive to newer Galaxy smartphones equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip. These features rely on the Personal Data Engine and NPU neuroprocessor, meaning users of older models will not receive these innovations.

articles.title: 37 Products That Take A Time-Consuming Task And Make It A Lot Easier
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" sponge set, while SneakErasers offers dual-sided erasers for restoring sneakers. Oxo launched the compact Brew Rapid Brewer for faster cold brew. Plaud released an AI voice recorder, generating summaries and to-do lists using ChatGPT to summarize notes.

articles.title: OnePlus Skips Foldable Release This Year, Focuses on Future Innovations
articles.author: Phone Arena
articles.summary: OnePlus will not release a new foldable phone this year, choosing to integrate hardware innovations from OPPO's upcoming Find N5 into their products. Current OnePlus Open owners will continue to receive software updates and security patches. OnePlus aims to bring innovative foldable devices to the market in the future.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke AI Refrigerator series launch in India, price starts at Rs 56,990
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new range of Bespoke AI Refrigerators in 330L and 350L capacities, featuring AI Energy Mode, AI Home Care, and Smart Forward. These refrigerators are available in multiple finishes and capacities starting at Rs 56990 across leading retail stores, e-commerce platforms, and Samsung's official website. The refrigerators also features Twin Cooling Plus technology to enhance freshness.

articles.title: Find out why people think the Fit + Fresh Neoprene Weekender Bag is a Dagne Dover dupe
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Fit + Fresh is launching the Premium Neoprene Weekender Bag, available on Amazon. The bag features a trolley sleeve, multiple pockets, and a water-resistant design, and it is currently on sale for $44.45, which is 11% off the regular price.

articles.title: Find out why people think the Fit + Fresh Neoprene Weekender Bag is a Dagne Dover dupe
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Fit + Fresh is offering its Premium Neoprene Weekender Bag, featuring a trolley sleeve, multiple pockets, and water-resistant neoprene material, for various trips. Currently, the bag is on sale at Amazon for $44.45, which is 11% off its typical price.

articles.title: Find out why people think the Fit + Fresh Neoprene Weekender Bag is a Dagne Dover dupe
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Amazon is offering an 11% discount on the Fit + Fresh Premium Neoprene Weekender Bag, reducing its price to under $45. The bag features a trolley sleeve and is presented as a stylish and functional option for travelers.

articles.title: Amazon has Drybar's newest Triple Shot hair dryer styles straight, shiny, and wavy all in one multi-tool for just $200
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Drybar launched the Triple Shot Interchangeable Blow-Dryer Brush, a 3-in-1 blowout bundle available on Amazon for $190. The bundle includes three interchangeable attachments for creating different hairstyles: defined waves and curls, shine and volume, or a smooth, straight finish.

articles.title: Achieve Salon-Quality Straight Hair at Home With TRESemme's New Silk Press Range
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: TRESemme has launched its Silk Press Range, a new line of hair care products designed to deliver salon-quality straight hair at home without heat. The four-step regime, featuring Amino Press technology, includes an ampoule, shampoo, mask, and finishing serum. The range is available through retailers like Nykaa and Amazon.

articles.title: Amazon's best-selling handheld vacuum cleaner hailed 'amazing' as it drops 47% to £27
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Amazon shoppers are purchasing a discounted handheld vacuum cleaner that is the best-selling product in Amazon's handheld vacuums category. The vacuum is known for its 'lightweight' and 'portable' design and features an enhanced HEPA filter and LED light. It is available for £27.07 on Amazon.

articles.title: The wonderful aromas of Eagle's Idaho Soap Company
articles.summary: Idaho Soap Company produces handmade natural soaps, lotions, bath bombs, body butters, shower steamers, lip balms, lip scrubs, and a men's line. The soaps undergo a four to six-week curing process and are available for purchase in person, online, at local grocery stores and hotels, and at the Boise Airport.

articles.title: How you can opt for specific food types on Swiggy
articles.summary: Swiggy is releasing an update to its app on the Google Play Store. The latest version unlocks new and enhanced features designed to help users discover their favorite food more easily, improving the food discovery process.

articles.title: TRESemmé Unveils Silk Press Haircare Range - A Revolutionary Heatless Treatment for Smooth, Straight Hair
articles.summary: TRESemmé has launched the Silk Press Range, a 4-step hair regime designed to give users silky, straight hair without heat or harsh chemicals. The range includes a pre-wash ampoule, sulphate-free shampoo, nourishing mask, and finishing serum, all formulated with Amino Press [20] technology to deliver salon-quality results at home. The Silk Press Range is now available on Nykaa, Myntra, Amazon, Tira, Purplle, Blinkit and other leading e-retailers.

articles.title: Dirty truth about mopping – and tech that's changing it
articles.author: IBT Technology Desk
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced the WashG1 wet floor cleaner, an advanced alternative to traditional mopping. The WashG1 utilizes dual-action cleaning with motorized rollers to remove wet and dry dirt, and it features separate tanks for clean and dirty water ensuring hygienic cleaning. The WashG1 also offers a self-cleaning cycle, enhancing efficiency and reducing manual labor.

articles.title: ESScent Of The Week: This $365 Bottle of Liquid Silk Has TikTok In A Chokehold
articles.author: Kimberly Wilson
articles.summary: Dries Van Noten released Soie Malaquais, a luxury fragrance, in 2022. The fragrance, housed in a refillable bottle, features notes of cocoa, rose, blackcurrant, and bergamot and is designed to evoke the feeling of silk. Priced at $365, it is marketed as a long-lasting, luxury experience.

articles.title: Philips is helping Gen-Z consumers be green flags this V-Day with their 'Steam It Up' campaign
articles.author: Mansi Praharaj
articles.summary: Philips launched the 'Steam It Up' campaign on Valentine's Day, featuring the Philips Garment Steamer targeted toward Gen Z consumers. The campaign includes a social media video and an interactive 'Red Flag > Green Flag' Steaming Booth at Worldmark Gurugram, demonstrating the product's ability to transform wrinkled clothes into stylish outfits. Ms. Pooja Baid, Chief Marketing Officer at Versuni India (Philips Domestic Appliances) highlights that the Philips Garment Steamer series is designed for quick, hassle-free styling.

articles.title: Kenilworth's Bubbles and Baskets Laundromat Offer Valentine's Day Special
articles.summary: Bubbles & Baskets laundromat is offering a 15% discount on their wash, dry, and fold services for Valentine's Day. Customers can redeem the discount by mentioning 'FOR THE LOVE OF LAUNDRY'.

articles.title: ‘Extremely risky' for NJZ, formerly NewJeans, to pursue new direction
articles.author: The Korea Times
articles.summary: K-pop group NewJeans, now NJZ, will debut new music at ComplexCon Hong Kong in March. This launch follows their departure from their agency and a rebrand, adding complexity to their legal battle with Hybe Labels' subsidiary Ador.

articles.title: The top-rated Ninja Slushi is $112 off at Walmart right now
articles.author: Cailey Lindberg
articles.summary: Ninja Slushi kitchen appliance is on sale for $418, reduced from $530, offering five preset settings for frozen beverages without ice. Wayfair is offering up to 65% off bedding for President's Day 2025, including deals on comforters starting as low as $39. The Wayfair All Season Down Comforter is available for $51, down from $150.

articles.title: Tried and tested clear fake tans that don't smell or stain sheets
articles.author: Zoe Cripps
articles.summary: Several brands, including Nip+Fab, St. Tropez, Isle of Paradise, St. Moriz, Skin + Tan, b.tan, Tan-Luxe, Tanologist and Garnier have introduced clear tanning formulas like mists, gels, and mousses that promise a flawless, bronzed look without staining. These products offer various benefits such as exfoliation, hydration, and customizable color intensity, with testers reporting positive experiences regarding ease of use, color payoff, and lack of transfer to bedding.

articles.title: 'My fiancé got a Dyson hairdryer but I've used it more than her - it dries my beard in a minute'
articles.author: Samuel Jones
articles.summary: Dyson's Supersonic hairdryer, priced at £329.99, is praised for its powerful and efficient drying capabilities, reducing drying time for both short and long hair, and aiding in styling with various heat and power settings and attachments. User reviews on Dyson's website average 4.6 stars out of 5. A cheaper alternative, Shark's SpeedStyle Pro 3-in-1 High-Velocity Hair Dryer, is priced at £145.99 and also includes styling attachments, boasting a rating of 4.8 out of 5.

articles.title: The 6 best cordless vacuums for 2025
articles.author: Valentina Palladino
articles.summary: Dyson Gen 5 Detect vacuum with single-button start has stronger suction power. Shark Detect Pro includes a self-emptying base for convenient cleaning. Cordless vacuums have various features to clean pet hair and other debris.

articles.title: My sex doll is mad at me: A short story
articles.author: Leo Herrera
articles.summary: The article describes the Artemis doll, a sophisticated sex doll featuring advanced technology such as heating rods, a breathing mechanism, and programmed responses. The Artemis doll requires firmware updates and offers features like role-playing, ASMR, and integration with various apps, all covered by a warranty from the manufacturer.

articles.title: The new £40 summer dress shopper calls her 'favourite M&S purchase of all time'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) launched a new Floral V-Neck Midi Dress priced at £39.50. Customer feedback indicates positive reception of the dress's print, design, and material. However, some customers mentioned the fit and the amount of material in the skirt was not to their taste.

articles.title: The Philosophy of Expertise: Ishrath Nawaz's Vision for Advertising Success
articles.summary: Ishrath Nawaz assisted a European home appliances brand in launching a new washing machine in India. The campaign focused on the emotional value of clothes and memories, revitalizing brand perception and increasing market share. This new campaign idea seamlessly integrated with the brand's global communication strategy, showcasing an innovative product launch strategy.

articles.title: There is a new generation of electronic dictionaries. And we even tested it
articles.author: DAVID ROSENTHAL
articles.summary: Babylon has launched Babylon AI, a new electronic dictionary that utilizes artificial intelligence. Babylon AI includes an AI-based spelling correction system and 650,000 entries, nearly twice the content available in Oxford's electronic dictionary. The device features a user-friendly design with a large, clear screen and a comfortable keyboard.

articles.title: AI giants Baidu, OpenAI offer their chatbots for free in response to DeepSeek's advance
articles.author: John Liu
articles.summary: Baidu will make its AI chatbot Ernie Bot free, featuring premium AI painting capabilities for both mobile and desktop users starting April 1. Baidu plans to launch the next generation of its AI model by the end of June, making it open source like DeepSeek's models, while Ernie's Deep Search function will launch for free in April.

articles.title: The ‘AI Energy' washing machine that could reduce energy use by 70pc, and other must haves for your home
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Ikea reinvented the Mila armchair into the Dyvlinge swivel armchair to enhance stability and safety. The Dyvlinge is part of Ikea's Nytillverkad collection and is available for purchase at ikea.com for €199.

articles.title: The best new kitchen gadgets we're shopping in 2025
articles.author: Elizabeth Gracie
articles.summary: KitchenAid is launching a new "butter" color for its Stand Mixer, designated as the Colour of the Year for 2025. This new colorway follows previous nostalgic colors and includes 10 speeds, two stainless steel bowls, and five accessories. The stand mixer also supports over 12 attachments for versatile cooking.

articles.title: Good news for foodies as Deliveroo comes to Alresford
articles.author: Christopher Atkinson
articles.summary: Deliveroo launched its food delivery service in Alresford in January. Residents can order takeaways from national brands like Five Guys, Sainsbury's and Asda, and local restaurants such as Lucky Lychee, Five Boroughs Pizza and Shanghai Papa.

articles.title: Nongshim will release the follow-up to "Muktaekang Cheongyang Mayo Taste," which led to the snack cr..
articles.author: Jung Seulgi.
articles.summary: Nongshim is launching 'Muktaekang Black Bean Paste Mayo Taste' on the 17th at retailers and e-commerce nationwide. This new flavor contains dried pollack extract, roasted pollack salad powder, domestic red pepper paste, and mayonnaise seasoning. It is a follow-up to 'Muktaekang Cheongyang Mayo Taste,' which sold 40 million bags since its launch in June 2023.

articles.title: UGC Factory: A UGC content agency using technology to transform content creation
articles.author: Jon Stojan
articles.summary: UGC Factory introduces its service of creating UGC video ads. They employ AI and advanced technologies like automated video editing and sentiment analysis to create impactful ads. The company uses data analysis to predict trends and enhance targeting to create engaging content.

articles.title: Vacuum with legs puts new spin on doing the chores
articles.author: Tim Biggs
articles.summary: Dreame is launching the X50 Ultra robot vacuum in Australia next month for $3000. The new model features increased suction, hotter water, descaling, hot-air mop drying, self-adjusting detergent mixing, UV sterilisation and improved obstacle detection and swinging mop pads for corners, a lowering sensor tower, and a 'Pro Leap' system for climbing obstacles.

articles.title: 7 Years of OS Updates: What It Means for Smartphone Longevity
articles.summary: Google's Pixel 8 and Pixel 8 Pro models introduced a commitment to seven years of OS updates and security patches. Samsung followed suit by extending its update policy to match Google's seven-year commitment for its latest series. This sets a new industry standard for long-term software support.

articles.title: Literally Just 27 Of The Coolest Products I've Seen Recently
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: Nyx has introduced the Shine Loud liquid lipstick, offering long-lasting, transfer-resistant color. Cloud Haven launched pit bull charm hoop earrings with proceeds benefiting shelter dogs. Vendula London released a New York hot dog corgi purse. BroPupDesigns creates customized pet portraits in F1 uniforms, offering a unique personalized product.

articles.title: 2025 Zeekr X Review: Why This Car Will Wake-Up Every Luxury Car Brand
articles.author: Ben Mckimm
articles.summary: Zeekr is launching its Zeekr X model in Australia, positioned to compete with the Tesla Model Y. The Zeekr X has two models the RWD model priced from AUD$56,900 and the AWD model priced from AUD$64,900. The Zeekr X boasts features such as a 14.6' central touchscreen, Qualcomm Snapdragon processor, and a premium sound system, with the AWD model offering enhanced power, performance, and additional features like a 24.3-inch Augmented Reality heads-up display.

articles.title: The ‘AI Energy' washing machine that could reduce energy use by 70pc, and other must haves for your home
articles.author: Eleanor Flegg
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Series 8 AI Energy washing machine with EcoBubble technology, promising a 70% reduction in energy consumption. Ikea has reintroduced the Dyvlinge swivel armchair, an updated version of the 1967 Mila design. Sonas Bathrooms offers the Abyss freestanding bath in various colors. Homesense offers a wiggle-handled pink glass jug. Finally, Redcandy sells the Magic Mushroom Mister for houseplants.

articles.title: Benalla Woolworths relaunched
articles.author: Contributed
articles.summary: Woolworths launched a fresh new look at its Benalla store.

articles.title: MTN's ‘Go M.A.D' train stops in Abuja, hosts creative community
articles.author: Rotimi Ige
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria brought its "Go Make A Difference" (Go M.A.D.) campaign to Abuja, encouraging residents to use their skills, passions, and digital tools to create impact in their communities. The campaign leverages MTN data and digital solutions to empower Nigerians to act and amplify their ideas.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy S25 opens new world of AI
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched its Galaxy S25 series, emphasizing enhanced AI capabilities, camera technology, and improved display quality. The series introduces features like 'Now Brief' for personalized information and enhanced 'Circle to Search,' while also providing 'Live Translate' and 'Writing Assist' for improved communication and text editing. The Galaxy S25 Ultra is available in four titanium finishes, while the S25+ and S25 models offer a variety of colors.

articles.title: BMW M5 facelift spied just months after model debut
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: G90 M5 is testing a heavily camouflaged example of a revised exterior styling, both front and rear. The new G90 M5 was unveiled in June 2024.

articles.title: BMW M5 facelift spied just months after model debut
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: BMW is reportedly developing an update for its current-generation M5 super sedan.

articles.title: TikTok returns to Apple, Google app stores
articles.author: Jonathan Vanian
articles.summary: Crayon launched Cloud IQ, a next-generation tool, to help partners manage their software. It has been rolled out, deployed, and executed with partners in Southeast Asia, with teams in Australia and New Zealand starting to work with partners on the new platform. Cloud IQ allows partners to procure necessary software and get all the data required to make informed decisions for their business and research.

articles.title: This robot vacuum from one of the best brands I've tested is over $400 off for Presidents' Day
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Dreame's L10s Ultra robot vacuum and mop is available at half price, reduced from $900 to $455, for Amazon's Presidents' Day sale. This robot vacuum features 5,300Pa of suction power and automates mop pad washing/drying and dustbin emptying at its base station.

articles.title: Forget Dyson: Roborock's wet-dry vacuum left my floors spotless (and it's on sale for $200)
articles.author: Maria Diaz
articles.summary: Roborock is launching the Flexi Lite, a wet-dry vacuum and mop priced at $400 but currently offered at $200 with a coupon.  The Flexi Lite features self-cleaning, separate clean and dirty water tanks, and the ability to handle wet and dry messes simultaneously.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra Review: Major upgrade makes it ‘best of the best'
articles.author: Tahnee-Jae Lopez-Vito
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Ultra, featuring a 50MP ultra-wide camera lens, enhanced AI Select features, and upgrades to Galaxy AI and One UI.  The phone also includes new features like Audio Eraser and Generative Edit, along with Gemini Live replacing Bixby.  Available in multiple colors, the Galaxy S25 Ultra is priced starting at $2149 and includes a complimentary six-month subscription to Gemini Advanced.

articles.title: Absa Bank: Empowering growth and success in 2025
articles.author: Edward Nartey
articles.summary: Early last year, the company launched its brand promise, 'Your Story Matters.' This commitment focuses on prioritizing clients and stakeholders in every decision, innovation, and partnership.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Reports Fiscal Q3 2025 Results
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd., a high-performance, luxury skiwear and lifestyle brand, combines technical excellence with fashion.

articles.title: Hey Dude's St. Patrick's Day sneakers just dropped, and you'll want to grab them before ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Hey Dude launched its latest sneaker collection, offering Irish-themed styles for St. Patrick's Day celebrations. This new collection aims to provide a festive and stylish footwear option.

articles.title: Hands on: the Acer Predator Helios Neo 18 AI is a strong second step for ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Acer is introducing its newest 'Neo' laptops. These laptops aim to balance premium features with a budget-friendly price point while also highlighting the integration of AI technology.

articles.title: Relish the taste of Indian summers with Mr Butler's ‘Fizzo'
articles.summary: Mr. Butler, an Indian soda maker, launched 'Fizzo', a ready-to-drink beverage with Indian flavors like Ginger Cinnamon, Guava Chilli, Raw Mango Chilli, and Lime Sweet & Salt. Fizzo is made from natural ingredients, rich in Vitamin C and has low sugar content. It is currently available in Ernakulam stores, Mr Butler's online store, Swiggy Instamart and Blinkit.
